admin.howToTrain: No estúdio, clique no botão "Treinar agora" (localizado no canto inferior direito).

alerting.makeSureEnabled: Certifique-se de que o alerta está habilitado em seu Botpress Config (e que você reiniciou o servidor se acabou de fazer a alteração).
alerting.notEnabled: O alerta não está habilitado ou não há estatísticas.

admin.botpressIsNotLicensed: O Botpress não está licenciado no momento. Atualize sua licença para reativar todos os recursos.
admin.createMasterAdminAccount: Esta é a primeira vez que você executa o Botpress. Crie a conta de administrador mestre.

debug.confUpdated: DConfiguração de depuração atualizada com sucesso!
debug.helpText: Esta página permite que você habilite ou desabilite alguns escopos de depuração ao usar o Botpress. Esta lista é preenchida enquanto os recursos estão sendo usados, portanto, alguns itens podem estar faltando
debug.persistChecked: Quando marcada, as opções de depuração selecionadas serão habilitadas após cada reinicialização do servidor

admin.firstTimeYouRun: Esta é a primeira vez que você executa o Botpress. Escolha uma senha.

languages.cannotBeEdited: Os idiomas não podem ser editados porque o Language Server é somente leitura
languages.confirmDelete: Tem certeza que deseja excluir {language} do servidor?
languages.runOwnLanguageServer: Para executar seu próprio servidor de idioma, siga as instruções

status.enableMethod1: You can enable Botpress Pro by manually editing the file {file} and setting the value {field} to true.
status.enabledMethod2: Click on the button below. This will enable the required configuration and will automatically reboot the server. Please note: Rebooting the server this way will prevent you from reading the logs on screen (except if you output logs to the file system).
status.fingerprintNoMatch: Your license fingerprint doesn't match your machine/cluster fingerprints.
status.official: official botpress binary or docker image
status.officialBinary: official botpress binary or docker image
status.thisIsSupport: This is the support offered by Botpress
status.unofficialBuildText: We noticed that you are running a custom build of Botpress, which doesn't contain the Botpress Professional extensions. Make sure you use an {official}. You won't be able to activate {pro} otherwise.
status.useOfficial: Make sure you use an {officialBinary}, you won't be able to activate pro otherwise.
status.waitWhileReboot: Please wait while the server reboots, this may take a couple of seconds.

logs.rowLimitReached: Row limit reached. Choose a different time range

modules.experimentalWarning: The modules below are experimental, and may change drastically before their official release. Their use in production is not recommended. Migration will not be automatic for version upgrades
modules.helpText: Enabling/disabling a module will update its status in the configuration files. If running a cluster in production, a restart of each node will be required for the change to take effect. Otherwise, the change will be immediate.
modules.invalidModule: The module archive appears to be invalid
modules.rebootRequired: Your Botpress configuration file was updated successfully. The server must be restarted for changes to take effect.
modules.unpackRequired: This module is compressed. Unpack it to display more information
modules.uploadInfo: Once your module is uploaded, it will be active after the next server restart. To manage uploaded modules, use the advanced editor on the code editor.

monitoring.restartInProgress: Server restart in progress. To know when the server is back up, watch the uptime for that server in the Overview. You can close this window safely.
monitoring.youAreAboutToRestart: You are about to restart the Botpress server hosted on

admin.pageRestrictedToAdmins: This page is restricted to Super Admins

requirements.alsoRequired: To use this feature, these features are also required:
requirements.confUpdated: Configuration updated successfully! Restart Botpress for changes to take effect
requirements.pro: Botpress Pro must be enabled with a valid license
requirements.redis: Redis must be enabled and correctly configured
requirements.toUseRestart: To use this feature, click on the button below. A server restart will be required for changes to take effect.

admin.setANewPassword: Your password has expired or was temporary. Please set a new password.
admin.successfullyAuthenticated: Successfully authenticated. You can close this window.
admin.uiLanguageHelper: This settings only affects the user interface of Botpress and does not change the language of your bots.

versioning.conflictMessage: Remote has changes that are not synced to your environment. Backup your changes and use "pull" to get those changes on your file system. If you still want to overwrite remote changes, turn on the switch "Force push my changes" then press the button
versioning.forcePushInfo: Force-pushing will skip the comparison between your local changes and the remote changes, and will overwrite the remote data
versioning.pushLocalNeedsBFFS: Pushing local changes to a remote server is only possible when using the BPFS Storage "Database".
versioning.selectArchivedExported: Select an archive exported from another server. If there are conflicts, you will be able to review them before pushing.
versioning.useThisCommand: Use this command to copy the remote data on your local file system.
versioning.youCanPushWithThisCommand: If you are using the database storage for BPFS, you can also push your local changes to the database using this command:

bots.alwaysAssignedToWorkspace: In Botpress, bots are always assigned to a workspace.
bots.approvedPromotion: Approved bot promotion to next stage
bots.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this bot? This can't be undone.
bots.couldNotMount: Could not mount bot. Check server logs for details

create.idHelper: This ID cannot be changed, so choose wisely. It will be displayed in the URL and your visitors can see it. Special characters are not allowed. Minimum length: 4
create.idPlaceholder: The ID of your bot (must be unique)
create.name: Bot Name
create.nameHelper: It will be displayed to your visitors. You can change it anytime.

bots.createYourFirstBot: Create your first bot to start building.

edit.couldNotFindPipeline: Could not find the pipeline to save

item.languageIsMissing: Bot language is missing. Please set it in bot config.

bots.noBotYet: Este espaço de trabalho ainda não tem robôs
bots.noSpecifiedLanguage: You have bots without specified language. Default language is mandatory since Botpress 11.8. Please set bot language in the bot config page.

rollback.confirm: Are you sure you want to rollback the bot to that revision? All existing content, flows, questions, etc. will be overwritten. This can't be undone.
rollback.confirmYes: Yes, rollback the bot to that version
rollback.error: Error while rollbacking to a previous version: {msg}

administrator.description: Administrators have full access to the workspace including adding members, creating bots and synchronizing changes.
administrator.name: Administrator

contentEditor.description: Content Editors have read/write access to content and NLU, and read-only access to flows and actions.
contentEditor.name: Content Editor

developer.description: Developers have full read/write access to bots, including flows, content, NLU and actions
developer.name: Developer

roles.helpText: To change roles, please see “roles” in the workspaces.json file.
roles.title: Roles

users.chatUsersHelp: Chat users are only allowed to talk with bots. They can see a list of all the bots in the workspace

collaborators.chooseRole: Choose a role for that user
collaborators.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {user}'s account?
collaborators.help: Create, delete users or update their role.
collaborators.inviteExistingUser: Invite an existing user, or type his e-mail address and press Enter
collaborators.noCollaboratorsYet: This workspace has no collaborators, yet
collaborators.passwordResetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset {user}'s password?
collaborators.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {user} from this workspace?
collaborators.removeFail: Could not remove user from workspace: {msg}
collaborators.removeSucess: User {user} was removed from workspace successfully
